short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly read your Chrome Bookmarks, Twitter Likes, Pinboard Unreads, and Feedbin Favorites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Fastfave, you can quickly read your Chrome Bookmarks, Twitter Likes, Pinboard Unreads, and Feedbin Favorites.

Connect as many or as few services as you use. Click the gold star and choose a service to begin. You'll see several tabs open, each representing an item from that service. As you close each tab, another will appear. Eventually you'll have quickly ready everything.

If you have hundreds of pages saved to read, try it. You'll love how quickly you can read articles with Fastfave.

Never wait for page loads. While you read one article, the next one is loading.

Read full web pages, not just a preview or summary. You can read much faster on a full screen.

If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions, email me at richard@fastfave.com. I love hearing from users!

Support for more services coming soon.
